laws.full_text:
geographic scope, and activities prohibited
Specific duration limit: n/a
Wage threshold: n/a
Notice requirement: n/a
Exceptions: Generally banned for physicians
North Dakota

Banned for all employees
Nebraska

Traditional non-competes unenforceable; non-competes allowed only to the extent they restrict the former employee from doing business with customers the former employee actually did business with (g
laws.suggestion: Remove the non-compete clause entirely as it is void under Nebraska law, except to the extent it restricts activities. Replace with: "Employee agrees not to disclose or use confidential information and trade secrets of the company, and to refrain from soliciting company employees or customers for a period of [time] after termination of employment, but only to the extent such restrictions are reasonable and necessary to protect the company's legitimate business interests.

review_notes.next_steps: Verify statute citations and effective dates
